Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in SunPower products.
Currently SunPower Australia supplies the E-Series 327Watt solar panel, which is rated at 20.4% efficiency and is backed by a 25-year power and product warranty.
The recently launched X-Series 345Watt solar panel has proved extremely popular, but unfortunately due to high demand and limited production these are only available in a small number of countries, excluding Australia.
For your reference I have attached a copy of our E-Series product and warranty data sheets.
Would you like to be connected with one of our local Authorised Partners, who could offer you a quote for SunPower E-Series panels?
Regards, {!Contact.OwnerFullName}| Customer Service Representative - Australia 1800.786.769 | customerservice.australia@sunpower.com
